responsibilities: Develop innovative Generative AI solutions based on technologies, tools, algorithms, and methods from the Generative AI field.

Implement generative AI use cases that bring measurable economic benefit to Covestro by designing and implementing suitable generative AI solution architectures, including software design and Cloud architectures.

Work on use cases throughout the entire lifecycle of generative AI products, such as development and implementation of prototypes, minimum viable products (MVP), and supporting the products in the operational phase.
Select and evaluate proposals from external solution providers and consulting companies in terms of their effectiveness and usefulness.
Join and contribute to internal communities of practice to shape the generative AI tech-stack of Covestro.
qualifications: Follow innovations and changes in the generative AI domain.
Ability to present and effectively communicate to colleagues from different departments and levels.
Ability to work in a dynamic and fast-paced working environment.
analysis: The job responsibilities clearly indicate a focus on Generative AI. The tasks include developing innovative Generative AI solutions, implementing generative AI use cases, and working on the lifecycle of generative AI products. Additionally, the responsibilities mention designing generative AI solution architectures and contributing to the generative AI tech-stack. The skills required also emphasize staying updated with innovations in the generative AI domain. There is no explicit mention of language models or LLMs, but the focus on Generative AI suggests that the job involves working with technologies related to this field, which may include language models as part of the broader Generative AI landscape.
